privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At TCG Store, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect your personal information.

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: We collect information you provide when creating an account, making a purchase or contacting us: name, email, shipping address, phone number and payment details.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our site: IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent and products viewed.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, remember your preferences and analyze site traffic. See our Cookies Policy for more information.

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: Process your orders and manage deliveries
Manage your account and authentication via Clerk
Process payments securely through Stripe
Send you order confirmations and shipping updates
Improve our products and services
Personalize your shopping experience
Comply with legal and tax obligations
Prevent fraud and ensure site security

dataSharing.title: 3. Sharing Information
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We only share your data with:
list: Service providers: Clerk (authentication), Stripe (payments), shipping companies
Legal authorities when required by law
Business partners with your explicit consent

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information: SSL/TLS encryption, secure storage in Supabase, and PCI DSS compliance for payments. However, no internet transmission method is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
list: Access your personal data
Rectify inaccurate or incomplete data
Request deletion of your data
Object to the processing of your data
Request data portability
Withdraw your consent at any time
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@tcgstore.com

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described, generally while your account is active or as required by law (minimum 6 years for tax data).

international.title: 7. International Transfers
international.content: Your data may be transferred and processed on servers located outside your country of residence. We ensure these transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.

minors.title: 8. Minors
minors.content: Our services are aimed at people over 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors without parental consent.

changes.title: 9. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a prominent notice on the site.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this policy, contact us at:

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, personalize content and analyze our traffic.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember your actions and preferences over a period of time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Necessary)
essential.description: Essential for the basic functioning of the site. Cannot be disabled.
examples: User session (Clerk): Keeps your session active
Shopping cart: Remembers products in your cart
Security: Protects against CSRF attacks and ensures secure connections

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Allow remembering your preferences and improving your experience.
examples: Language preference: Remembers your selected language (es, en, fr, de)
Preferred currency: Saves your currency selection
Visual theme: Remembers if you prefer light or dark mode

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site.
examples: Google Analytics: Analyzes traffic and user behavior
Performance metrics: Load time, errors, feature usage

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.
examples: Google Ads: Remarketing and campaign measurement

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: Some external services may set their own cookies:
list: Clerk: User authentication and session management
Stripe: Secure payment processing
Google Analytics: Web traffic analysis
Social Networks: Share buttons (Facebook, Twitter, Discord)

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.content: You can configure your browser to reject cookies or alert you when they are set. However, some site functions may not work properly.

links.title: Browser Help Links:
links.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
links.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

consent.title: 5. Your Consent
consent.content: By using our website, you accept the use of cookies according to this policy. You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting cookie settings in the banner that appears on your first visit.

updates.title: 6. Updates to this Policy
updates.content: We may update this cookies policy. The date of the last update is indicated at the beginning of this document.

object.title: 2. Purpose
object.content: TCG Store is an e-commerce platform dedicated to the sale of Trading Card Games (TCG), including single cards, booster packs, constructed decks, collector sets and related accessories.

termsOfUse.title: 3. Terms of Use
termsOfUse.intro: Access and use of this website implies acceptance of these conditions:
list: The user agrees to make appropriate use of the site in accordance with the law
Use of the site for illegal purposes or that harms third parties is prohibited
The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their credentials
TCG Store reserves the right to suspend accounts that violate these conditions

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual and Industrial Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on the website (texts, images, design, logos, source code) is owned by TCG Store or third parties who have authorized its use. They are protected by intellectual property laws. Card game trademarks and logos (Pokémon, Magic: The Gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh!, etc.) are property of their respective owners.
intellectualProperty.restrictions: Reproduction, distribution or modification of any content without express authorization is prohibited.

prices.title: Prices
prices.content: Prices include VAT. Shipping costs are calculated at checkout. We reserve the right to modify prices without prior notice.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.content: We accept credit/debit card payments securely processed by Stripe. We do not store banking data on our servers.

orders.title: Order Processing
orders.content: Orders are subject to stock availability. We confirm each order by email. Estimated delivery time is 3-7 business days.

returns.title: Returns
returns.content: You have 14 days from receipt to return products (right of withdrawal, Consumer Law). Products must be unopened and in original packaging. Single cards and customized products cannot be returned except for factory defects.

liability.title: 6. Liability Limitation
liability.content: TCG Store is not responsible for service interruptions, technical errors or inaccuracies in content. We make reasonable efforts to ensure site availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.
liability.products: Product images are for reference only. Card condition is accurately described (Mint, Near Mint, etc.), but minor variations may exist.

links.title: 7. External Links
links.content: This site may contain links to third-party websites. TCG Store is not responsible for the content or privacy policies of such sites.

protection.title: 8. Data Protection
protection.content: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, in compliance with GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679) and LOPDGDD.

jurisdiction.title: 9. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: These conditions are governed by Spanish law. For any dispute, the parties submit to the courts and tribunals of [City], expressly waiving any other jurisdiction that may correspond to them.
